entry.title: Summary: Covenants Support - Bitcoin Wiki
entry.summary: Ethan Heilman communicates to monnsettler, clarifying that he has not referred to the process as "voting" in any of his posts. He further mentions that monnsettler is at liberty to develop activation clients, albeit with a hint of skepticism regarding their adoption, as indicated by the phrase "that nobody will run." This exchange is part of the ongoing discussions on the "Bitcoin Development Mailing List," a platform subscribed to by individuals for updates and dialogues concerning Bitcoin's development. The interaction underscores the open nature of development within the Bitcoin community, where proposals and ideas can be freely shared and critiqued.
